buttons.title: Get WF (P+Aq from RAM/Defaults)
buttons.description: Pulse and Acquire using default settings or settings stored in RAM

buttons.title: ADMM: VDC: N-E (Unatten/Std)
buttons.description: ADMM accessory command: Get the potential reading (voltage, Volts DC) from North-to-East, i.e. Reference Electrode to Structure
